text: Nihsandeha yara allahâ€Œra angikara o tadera pratiâ€Œsruti sbalpamulye bikri kare deya, tara -- parakale tadera jan'ya kono bhaga thakabe na, ara allah tadera sange katha'o balabena na ba tadera dike takabena na kiyamatera dine, ara tini tadera sud'dha'o karabena na, ara tadera jan'ya thakache kathora yatana.
